quiz.question: My son, forget not my .........; but let thine heart keep my ............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:1  My son, forget not my law; but let thine heart keep my commandments

quiz.question: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of ............ and ............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:4 So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.

quiz.question: Trust in the ........ with all thine ...........; and lean not unto thine own ...............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:5 Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding

quiz.question: In all thy ways ........... him, and he shall ...........
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

quiz.question: Be not .......... in thine own eyes: ............ the ........., and depart from evil.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:7 Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the Lord, and depart from evil.

quiz.question: My son, despise not the ........... of the Lord; neither be weary of his ................:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:11  My son, despise not the chastening of the Lord; neither be weary of his correction:

quiz.question: For whom the Lord loveth he ..........; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:12 For whom the Lord loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.

quiz.question: Happy is the man that findeth ........, and the man that getteth ..................
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:13 Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.

quiz.question: The ....... shall inherit ........: but .......... shall be the promotion of .......
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:35 The wise shall inherit glory: but shame shall be the promotion of fools.

quiz.question: For the Lord shall be thy ............., and shall keep thy ........... from being taken.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:26 For the Lord shall be thy confidence, and shall keep thy foot from being taken.

quiz.question: By his ................... the ........... are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:20 By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.

quiz.question: The Lord by ............. hath founded the ........; by ............ hath he established the ............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3: 19 The Lord by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.

quiz.question: Length of days is in her ...........; and in her .......... riches and ...........
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:16 Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour.

quiz.question: Say not unto thy ............., Go, and come again, and tomorrow I will give; ............... it by thee.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:28 Say not unto thy neighbour, Go, and come again, and tomorrow I will give; when thou hast it by thee.

quiz.question: The curse of the Lord is in the .................: but he blesseth the ............... of the just.
quiz.optb: house of the evil one, habitation
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:33  The curse of the Lord is in the house of the wicked: but he blesseth the habitation of the just.

quiz.question: Envy thou not the ......................, and choose none of his ways.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3: 31 Envy thou not the oppressor, and choose none of his ways.

quiz.question: ........ with a man without ..........., if he have done thee ............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:30 Strive not with a man without cause, if he have done thee no harm.

quiz.question: For the froward is ........ to the Lord: but his .......... is with the .....................
quiz.hints: Proverbs 3:32 For the froward is abomination to the Lord: but his secret is with the righteous.

quiz.question: For I give you ........, forsake ye not my ........
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:2 For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.

quiz.question: Then he ........... , and he said to me, Take hold of my ........ with all your heart; keep my .........., and you will live.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:4 Then he taught me, and he said to me, Take hold of my words with all your heart; keep my commands, and you will live.

quiz.question: When you ......., your steps will not be ......; when you run, you will not ........
quiz.hints:
Proverbs 4:12 When you walk, your steps will not be hampered;
    when you run, you will not stumble.

quiz.question: A ...... man will hear, and will increase ..........; and a man of ............ shall attain unto wise counsels:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:5 A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels:

quiz.question: The ........... of the Lord is the beginning of .........: but ........... despise wisdom and instruction.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:7  The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.

quiz.question: My son, hear the .......... of thy father, and .......... not the law of thy mother:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:8  My son, hear the instruction of thy father, and forsake not the law of thy mother:

quiz.question: My son, if ............ entice thee, ...... thou not.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:10  My son, if sinners entice thee, consent thou not.

quiz.question: Then shall they call upon me, but I will ..............; they shall ..........., but they shall not find me:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:28  Then shall they call upon me, but I will not answer; they shall seek me early, but they shall not find me:

quiz.question: For that they .......... knowledge, and did .......... the fear of the Lord:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:29  For that they hated knowledge, and did not choose the fear of the Lord:

quiz.question: Therefore shall they eat of the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their ...........
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:31  Therefore shall they eat of the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their own devices.

quiz.question: For the turning away of the simple shall slay them, and the ......... of fools shall ......... them.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:32  For the turning away of the simple shall slay them, and the prosperity of fools shall destroy them.

quiz.question: But whoso ......... unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be ....... from fear of evil.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 1:33  But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.

quiz.question: For the Lord giveth ......: out of his mouth cometh .......... and ...................
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:6  For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

quiz.question: He layeth up sound wisdom for the .......: he is a buckler to them that walk uprightly.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:7  He layeth up sound wisdom for the righteous: he is a buckler to them that walk uprightly.

quiz.question: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy ..........;
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:10  When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul;

quiz.question: .............. shall preserve thee, .............. shall keep thee:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:11  Discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee:

quiz.question: To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh ...........;
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:12  To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh froward things;

quiz.question: For her house ............ unto death, and her paths unto the dead.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:18  For her house inclineth unto death, and her paths unto the dead.

quiz.question: For the ........... shall dwell in the land, and the .......... shall remain in it.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:21  For the upright shall dwell in the land, and the perfect shall remain in it.

quiz.question: But the ........ shall be cut off from the earth, and the .............. shall be rooted out of it.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 2:22  But the wicked shall be cut off from the earth, and the transgressors shall be rooted out of it.

quiz.question: For I give you .........., forsake ye not my law.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:2  For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.

quiz.question: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my .............., and live.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:4  He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.

quiz.question: Get ........., get .......: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:5  Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

quiz.question: Forsake her not, and she shall ............ thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:6  Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.

quiz.question: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get ...........
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:7  Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.

quiz.question: Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to ..........., when thou dost embrace her.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:8  Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.

quiz.question: She shall give to thine head an ......... of grace: a crown of .......... shall she deliver to thee.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:9 She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.

quiz.question: Hear, O my son, and receive my ............; and the years of thy life shall be many.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:10  Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.

quiz.question: I have taught thee in the way of ..........; I have led thee in right paths.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:11  I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.

quiz.question: When thou goest, thy steps shall not be .........; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not .......
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:12  When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.

quiz.question: Enter not into the ...... of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:14  Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.

quiz.question: For they eat the bread of ........., and drink the wine of ................
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:17  For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

quiz.question: But the path of the just is as the .............., that shineth more and more unto the ..... day.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:18  But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

quiz.question: The way of the .......... is as .............: they know not at what they .............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:19  The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.

quiz.question: My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my ............
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:20  My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.

quiz.question: Let them ............ from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:21  Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.

quiz.question: Keep thy heart with all ...........; for out of it are the ............ of life.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:23  Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

quiz.question: Put away from thee a ........., and perverse ..... put far from thee.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 4:24  Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.

quiz.question: My son, attend unto my ........, and bow thine ear to my ...............:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 5:1 My son, attend unto my wisdom, and bow thine ear to my understanding:

quiz.question: For the lips of a strange woman drop as an ......., and her mouth is smoother than oil:
quiz.hints: Proverbs 5:3 For the lips of a strange woman drop as an honeycomb, and her mouth is smoother than oil:

quiz.question: But her end is bitter as ........, sharp as a two-edged sword.
quiz.hints: Proverbs 5:4 But her end is bitter as wormwood, sharp as a two-edged sword.

quiz.question: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man ..........., he cannot see the kingdom of God.
quiz.hints: John 3:3 Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

quiz.question: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of .............. and of the ........., he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
quiz.hints: John 3:5 Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

quiz.question: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the ........... is .
quiz.hints: John 3:6 That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

quiz.question: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the ......
quiz.hints: John 3:8 The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.

quiz.question: If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of ...............?
quiz.hints: John 3:12 If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of heavenly things?

quiz.question: And ........ hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.
quiz.hints: John 3:13 And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.

quiz.question: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have .....................
quiz.hints: John 3:16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

quiz.question: That whosoever believeth in him should ........., but have eternal life.
quiz.hints: John 3:15 That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

quiz.question: For God sent not his Son into the world to ........... the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
quiz.hints: John 3:17 For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.

quiz.question: He that believeth on him is not ...........: but he that believeth not is ........... already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
quiz.hints: John 3:18 He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.

quiz.question: And this is the ......, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.
quiz.hints: John 3:19 And this is the condemnation, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.

quiz.question: And John also was baptizing in ......... near to Salim, because there was much water there: and they came, and were baptized.
quiz.hints: John 3:23 And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim, because there was much water there: and they came, and were baptized.

quiz.question: For ......... was not yet cast into prison.
quiz.hints: John 3:24 For John was not yet cast into prison.

quiz.question: John answered and said, A man can receive ......, except it be given him from .............
quiz.hints: John 3:27 John answered and said, A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.

quiz.question: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given ......... into his hand.
quiz.hints: John 3:35 The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.

quiz.question: He that believeth on the Son hath ............: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the ........ of God abideth on him.
quiz.hints: John 3:36 He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.

quiz.question: ............... to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, .............; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.
quiz.hints: James 4:8 Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.

quiz.question: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall ........, if we faint not.
quiz.hints: Galatians 6:9 And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

quiz.question: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
quiz.hints: Galatians 6:1 Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
